page.title: 13FARMING
page.content: {AGRICULTURE IN SOUTHILL {} A farmer in Southill owns five hundred acres.He has owned the farm for sixty five years.He mainly grew crops,such as{Rape, Peas, Wheat, {Barley,}and occasionally {Oats.}He had no animals but quite a few pieces of machinery. Every year he had quite good crops depending on the weather.He owned a large farm house secluded by trees, and miles of surrounding fields. In the morning the farmer would usually wake up at five o'clock. He would drive around the farm and his property, seeing what jobs are needed to be done.At seven o'clock,he starts work.Working on a farm is a full time job for him.He had four helpers.
